faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Common questions about our web development services

hosting.a: We typically deploy on Netlify, Vercel, or your existing infrastructure. All included in our packages.

techStack.q: What tech stack do you use?
techStack.a: React, Next.js, Tailwind, Node.js—modern, performant tools that are easy to maintain.

seo.a: Yes. Metadata, structured data, performance optimization, and content strategy are all included.

accessibility.a: Absolutely. AA+ compliance, keyboard navigation, and screen reader support are standard.
